rules_text: Whenever Determined to Prevail or another artifact or enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains indestructible and vigilance until end of turn.
flavor_text: [i]Forage and check on another outpost. The task was simple, and they hadn't trusted Tahti to do it alone; but for the first time in forever, she felt [/i]strong[i].[/i]
